ygData.subject: Rathe Mnts
ygData.msgSnippet: Hiya and thanks for all the advice from my last post :-) so one more question...My guild is going to the Rathe Mnts this week to kill HG and Giant Skellys at
ygData.messageBody:
Hiya and thanks for all the advice from my last post :-)
so one more question...My guild is going to the Rathe Mnts this week to kill HG and Giant Skellys at the ruins, we will pull the HG's to the ruins 2-3 groups one group (mine) will be fighting GSkellys, what songs do ye recomend for me to arm? I'm 22nd level the group i'm in is caster and druid heavy but we may have a second bard the 2 HG groups are Tank heavy with an enchanter and druid and wiz backup.
*************************************
Pinen Warsong
Hopeless Bard of the Rathe
Capt. of the Noble Warriors of Norrath
Bard of the 22nd Song
*************************************
*******ALWAYS REMEMBER********************
When in doubt, knock 'em out!
-"Big Vinny" NYC Hells Angles c.1976
Art Saves Lives
Sometimes you flog a dead horse and it comes back to life.
Wear your best Scotchguarded Polyester, just to be safe.
Sweat Heavy, Rythmic drops of Red,red blood!
I haven't felt this good about my body in days.
Play what you mean.
And I'll have the Poo-Poo Platter, Sir.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
